about.title: About Pier Gorelli
about.description: Full-stack web dev with 1.5 years at a US startup. Skilled in React, Next.js, Tailwind, Chrome extensions & SEO. I Build engaging & scalable web apps. Looking to bring your vision to life? Let's connect

services.title: Services
services.description: R44J offers a range of services including web development, SEO, Chrome extensions, and e-commerce. Specializing in Figma designs, scalable architectures, backend and frontend development, and collaborating on IOS apps, mobile apps, and PWAs.
